projects.title: Scalable Three-Tier Web Architecture
projects.description: Architected and deployed a highly available three-tier application on AWS with Nginx reverse proxy, Node.js backend, and MySQL database. Achieved 99.9% uptime with containerized services and optimized load balancing.

projects.title: Containerized Flask Microservice
projects.description: Designed and containerized a RESTful Flask microservice for consistent deployments across Linux environments. Reduced setup time from 30 minutes to under 5 minutes with Docker containerization.

projects.title: Cloud-Based Object Storage Solution
projects.description: Built a secure, scalable object storage solution using AWS S3 with IAM role-based access control. Integrated Boto3 SDK for automated file operations with 11 nines durability guarantee.

projects.title: Automated System Monitoring & Logging Framework
projects.description: Developed automated Bash scripts for system health monitoring, log rotation, and performance collection on Linux servers. Implemented cron jobs for proactive monitoring reducing incident detection time by 35%.

projects.title: CI/CD Pipeline with Automated Deployment
projects.description: Designed and implemented a Jenkins-based CI/CD pipeline automating build, test, and deployment stages for Node.js applications. Reduced deployment time from 15 minutes to under 2 minutes with continuous delivery to AWS EC2.
